00001 from wx.glcanvas import GLCanvas
00002 import wx
00003 from OpenGL.GLUT import *
00004 from OpenGL.GLU import *
00005 from OpenGL.GL import *
00006 init = 0
00007 
00008 class IGAGLCanvas(GLCanvas):
00009     def __init__(self, parent, data, tick = 100, size = (250, 250)):
00010         GLCanvas.__init__(self, parent, size = size, 
00011                 style=wx.DEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE|wx.NO_FULL_REPAINT_ON_RESIZE)
00012         wx.EVT_PAINT(self, self.OnPaint)
00013         wx.EVT_CHAR(self, self.OnKey)
00014 
00015         self.Bind(wx.EVT_SIZE, self.processSizeEvent, self)
00016         self.data = data
00017 
00018         self.InitGL()
00019 
00020         self.z = 0.0
00021         self.xspeed = 0.0
00022         self.yspeed = 0.0
00023         self.xrot = 0.0
00024         self.yrot = 0.0
00025 
00026         TIMER_ID = wx.NewId()
00027         self.timer = wx.Timer(self, TIMER_ID)  # message will be sent to the panel
00028         # milliseconds
00029         self.timer.Start(tick)
00030         wx.EVT_TIMER(self, TIMER_ID, self.tick)  # call the on_timer function
00031 
00032 #------------------------------------------#
00033     def Destroy(self):
00034         self.timer.Stop()
00035         GLCanvas.Destroy(self)
00036 
00037 #------------------------------------------#
00038     def tick(self, event):
00039         self.Refresh()
00040 
00041 #------------------------------------------#
00042     def OnKey(self, event):
00043         keycode = chr(event.GetKeyCode())
00044         if keycode == 'j':
00045             self.z -= .05
00046         elif keycode == 'k':
00047             self.z += .05
00048         elif keycode == 'h':
00049             self.xspeed -= 0.2
00050         elif keycode == 'l':
00051             self.xspeed -= 0.2
00052         elif keycode == 'u':
00053             self.yspeed -= 0.2
00054         elif keycode == 'i':
00055             self.yspeed -= 0.2
00056         elif keycode == 's':
00057             self.z = 0.0
00058             self.xspeed = 0.0
00059             self.yspeed = 0.0
00060             self.xrot = 0.0
00061             self.yrot = 0.0
00062 
00063         event.Skip()
00064 
00065 #------------------------------------------#
00066     def OnPaint(self,event):
00067         self.SetCurrent()
00068         self.OnDraw()
00069 
00070 
00071 #------------------------------------------#
00072     def OnReshape(self, width, height):
00073         """
00074         Reshape the OpenGL viewport based on the dimensions of the window.
00075         """
00076         if height==0:
00077             height=1
00078         glViewport(0, 0, width, height)
00079         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION)
00080         glLoadIdentity()
00081         gluPerspective(45, 1.0*width/height, 0.1, 100.0)
00082         gluLookAt(5., 0., 5., 0., 0., 0., 0., 1., 0.)
00083         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW)
00084         glLoadIdentity()
00085 
00086     
00087 #------------------------------------------#
00088     def GetGLExtents(self):
00089         """Get the extents of the OpenGL canvas."""
00090         return self.GetClientSize()
00091 
00092 #------------------------------------------#
00093     def processSizeEvent(self, event):
00094         """Process the resize event.""" 
00095         if self.GetContext():
00096             # Make sure the frame is shown before calling SetCurrent.
00097             self.Show()
00098             self.SetCurrent()
00099             
00100             size = self.GetGLExtents()
00101             self.OnReshape(size.width, size.height)
00102             self.Refresh(False)
00103         event.Skip()
00104 
00105 #------------------------------------------#
00106     def OnDraw(self):
00107 
00108         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);     
00109         glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST)
00110         glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH)
00111 
00112         glLoadIdentity()
00113         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, self.z)
00114         glRotatef(self.xrot, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00115         glRotatef(self.yrot, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0)
00116 
00117         v = self.data.values()
00118 
00119         glBegin(GL_POLYGON)                             
00120         colors = [ (1.0,0.0,0.0),
00121                     (0.0,1.0,0.0),
00122                     (0.0,0.0,1.0) ]
00123         len_col = len(colors)
00124 
00125 
00126         j = 0
00127         for i in xrange(0, len(v), 3):
00128             r,g,b = colors[(i+j)%len_col]
00129             glColor3f(r, g, b)
00130             glVertex3f( v[i], v[i+1], v[i+2] )
00131             j += 1
00132 
00133         glEnd()
00134 
00135         glFinish()
00136         self.SwapBuffers()
00137 
00138         self.xrot += self.xspeed
00139         self.yrot += self.yspeed
00140         
00141 #------------------------------------------#
00142     def InitGL(self):
00143         global init
00144         if not init:
00145             init = 1
00146 
00147             glutInit('')
00148             glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH)
00149             glClearColor(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00150             glClearDepth(1.0)
00151             glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST)
00152             glDepthFunc(GL_LEQUAL)
00153             glHint(GL_PERSPECTIVE_CORRECTION_HINT, GL_NICEST)
00154
